name: rune
description: Multi-agent engineering orchestration for Claude Code. Plan, work, review, inspect, test, and audit with Agent Teams. Includes 21 review agents, 5 research agents, 23 investigation agents, 11 utility agents, 2 work agents, 4 testing agents, 15 commands, and 17 skills. BMAD-derived elicitation methods for structured reasoning. Multi-language quality guidance (Python, TypeScript, Rust).
